section.name: MySQL
section.p: MySQL is fully supported for Scarab. Your setup tasks are:

in $SCARAB_ROOT/build.properties set the database type to mysql:
scarab.database.type = mysql

In addition you may want to set the follwoing properties which otherwise are automatically set to default values as follows:
scarab.database.port = 3306 scarab.database.username = sa scarab.database.password = scarab.database.admin.username = ${scarab.database.username} scarab.database.admin.password = ${scarab.database.password}
